en.title: FE Welcomes VIP QP Wearer, Senator Loren Legarda, Philippines!
en.content:
Jeremy Looi (Philippines Country Licensee & Presidential Director) shares with the honorable Senator Loren Legarda the health benefits of FE's Quantum Science products. She was very impressed with the simple demonstration on how the body absorbs scalar energy healing properties of the pendant, flask and the bracelet. Senator Legarda was reelected for a second term in 2007 and received the highest number of votes amongst all senatorial candidates. Her reputation as a journalist, goodwill ambassador and public servant is impeccable. Her confidence with FE and its line of Quantum Science products attests to the company's credibility. FE is truly proud to welcome the honorable Senator Loren Legarda into the FE family!
 
Senator Legarda holds on to the flask while Jeremy explains the benefits
of drinking micro clustered water.
Senator Legarda was amazed, experiencing the balancing demo with Jeremy.
Senator Legarda happily shows off her Quantum Pendant with FE Spokesman Samboy Lim.
Jeremy puts on the health-giving Quantum Bracelet on Senator Legarda.

Her reputation as a journalist, goodwill ambassador and public servant is impeccable. Her confidence with FE and its line of Quantum Science products attests to the company's credibility.
